entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
